channel.title: web3 on Blockchain Daily
channel.description: Recent content in web3 on Blockchain Daily

item.title: Crypto Update NEWS 2022-03-11
item.description: Payments Giant Stripe Launches Support for Crypto, NFTs (2 minute read) Businesses can now use Stripe as a payment method for crypto and NFT transactions.

item.title: Crypto Update NEWS 2022-03-09
item.description: Incredibly excited to share the launch of Avalanche Multiverse (Twitter thread) The Avalanche Foundation has launched Avalanche Multiverse, an up to $290 million incentive program focused on accelerating the adoption and growth of its subnet functionality.

item.title: Crypto Update NEWS 2022-02-22
item.description: Crypto exchange FTX is launching a gaming unit to drive token adoption (3 minute read) FTX is launching a new gaming unit focused on driving cryptocurrency and NFT adoption in the gaming world.

item.title: Crypto Update NEWS 2022-02-14
item.description: OpenSea Expands Into the Venture Capital Business (1 minute read) OpenSea is launching an investment arm dedicated to growing the web3 ecosystem.

item.title: Crypto Update NEWS 2022-02-09
item.description: NFT Trading Card Game Skyweaver Wraps Yearslong Tech Build With Public Launch (3 minute read) Skyweaver, a blockchain-based trading card game, has launched an Open Beta after years of development.

item.title: Crypto Update NEWS 2022-02-07
item.description: Ethereum Co-Founder Vitalik Buterin Discusses Proposal to Alleviate Network’s Congestion, High Fees (3 minute read) Ethereum co-founder Vitalik Buterin recently shared a tweet indicating that blob-carrying transactions may be added in a near-future hard fork.

item.title: Crypto Update NEWS 2022-01-28
item.description: Propy launches NFT platform in the US, allowing real-world property to be bought as an NFT (2 minute read) Propy is a blockchain startup that is launching real-estate-backed NFTs in the US.

item.title: Crypto Update NEWS 2022-01-26
item.description: Etherscan Creators Launch ‘Ethereum Instant Messenger’ Blockscan Chat (2 minute read) The Blockscan Chat beta is now live.

item.title: Crypto Update NEWS 2022-01-10
item.description: Next Up for Chainlink in 2022: LINK Staking and ‘Internet of Blockchains’ (5 minute read) Chainlink’s ecosystem now has more than 1,000 project integrations, with 700 oracle networks securing over $75 billion in value.
